Class MazeGeneratorDFS

java.lang.Object
projatlab.algorithms.generators.MazeGenerator
projatlab.algorithms.generators.MazeGeneratorDFS
public class MazeGeneratorDFS extends MazeGenerator
MazeGeneratorDFS is a maze generation algorithm that uses Depth-First Search (DFS) to generate a random maze.

    • MazeGeneratorDFS

      public MazeGeneratorDFS(Maze maze, long seed, Boolean isPerfect)
      Constructs a MazeGeneratorDFS instance.
      Parameters:
      maze - The maze to generate.
      seed - The seed for random number generation (for reproducibility).
      isPerfect - Whether the maze should be perfect (no cycles).
